sentences: Michael Abene (born July 2, 1942) is a jazz pianist known for accompanying singers and for arranging music.
He had his first solo album Solo Piano in 1986.
Abene was born on July 2, 1942 in Brooklyn, New York.
He studied composition at the Manhattan School of Music.
Abene co-produced the album Avant Gershwin, which won the Grammy Award for Best Jazz Vocal Album in 2007.
